item.title: The original XBMC
item.author: Author
item.description: This entry is part 1 of 1 in the series Retrogaming Years ago, there was the original XBMC. Some of you might remember it, some others will discover it today. XBMC history As you might already know, Kodi used to be called XBox Media Center. It used to be an homebrew (ie. a custom application) for the first Microsoft Xbox gaming console.
